page.title: 08HOUSING AND LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: Stanbridge Mill: historic building not open to public. {Old Mill restored}as luxury farm house includes glass floor to see river below & ornamental working water wheel. 2 cottages converted from old barn. 5 persons live in main house. Owner runs local fuel company. A couple live in each cottage, 1 is gamekeeper. Rare flock of Portland sheep, herd of bull beef, 10 donkeys, 1,500 pheasants reared per year. Plenty of fish in river with private fishing. River Allen flows down shallow chalk valley, floods occasionally despite improvements. Water meadows noted for migrant birds. Herons & family of swans frequently seen. Trees & orchard planted recently. 2 cottages further down road, couple living in each. Land in area all arable.
